title: A Personal Meta-Modern Approach to Biblical Interpretation and Worldview Building
description:
A continuation of the preview video where I discussed how I plan to approach a Bible Study class for teenagers.

Part 1 available here: https://youtu.be/X-i3YrwnfEM
